snippet: Professor Bedau’s half-century career encompassed several cycles in the national debate over capital punishment, which he opposed as immoral, unjust and ineffective.
abstract: Hugo Bedau, philosopher and scholar who argued against capital punishment, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Professor Bedau’s half-century career encompassed several cycles in the national debate over capital punishment, which he opposed as immoral, unjust and ineffective.

headline.seo: Hugo Bedau, Philosopher Who Opposed Death Penalty, Dies at 85
headline.main: Hugo Bedau, Philosopher Who Opposed Death Penalty, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Hugo Bedau, 85, Dies; Wrote Against the Death Penalty
